pageContext.claim: “By the way, Bolton disagreed [about placing travel restriction on China because of the coronavirus]. He thought we shouldn't do it, okay? He didn't think and you know, I was in a room full of people. You were there. And of the people, I don’t know of anybody that thought I should do it.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a crazy timeline. Bolton left the administration in September, 2019; the coronavirus did not emerge until January, 2020.
